document_data.caption: A map showing the location of Piiradost Villa (labeled #7) on Sashtar Street.
document_data.name: Piiradost Villa
document_data.mainbody: '''Piiradost Villa''' was the family estate of the [[Nobility of Waterdeep|Waterdhavian noble house]] [[Piiradost]].
document_data.Location: The villa was located in the north section of [[Waterdeep]]'s [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]] on the northheast side of the intersection of [[Sashtar Street]] and the [[High Road (Waterdeep)|High Road]] at the border with the [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]]. The east side of the villa lay on [[Windborne Way]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Description: Four separate buildings were found within the walled compound arranged around a central garden that included a small pond. The buildings stood one or two stories tall.
